Create a bird feeder: Cut out a birdhouse shape from a magazine page and hang it outside with some birdseed.
Use as a fan: Open up a magazine and use it as a fan to cool yourself down on a hot day.
Create a photo frame: Cut out a picture frame shape from a magazine page and glue in a photo.
Use as a paperweight: Place a magazine on top of a stack of papers to keep them from blowing away.
Make a fort: Stack a bunch of magazines together and use them to build a fort.
